i-firewall: Uhluzo lwetrafikhi yenethiwekhi esekwe kwiseti yemithetho
i-malware: Igama elibanzi eliquka iintsholongwane, iintshulube, iiTrojans, njl.
phishing: Ii-imeyile ezinobuqhophololo ezizama ukuqhatha abasebenzisi ukuba banike ulwazi
iransomware: I-Malware eguqulela ngokuntsonkothileyo iifayile, ifuna intlawulo yokucima
uguqulelo oluntsonkothileyo: Inkqubo yokukrazula idatha ukuyenza ingafundeki ngaphandle kwesitshixo
ukucima: Inkqubo yokususa ukukrola idatha efihliweyo ibuyele kwifom efundekayo
ukuxhaphaza: Ikhowudi okanye ubuchule obuthatha ithuba lokuba sesichengeni
ukophulwa kwedatha: Ufikelelo olungagunyaziswanga okanye ukukhutshwa kolwazi olubuthathaka
izinto ezimbini zokuqinisekisa: Ifuna iqhekeza elongezelelweyo loqinisekiso ngaphaya kwegama lokugqitha
ubunjineli bezentlalo: Ukukhohlisa abantu ukuba banikezele ngolwazi oluyimfihlo
uvavanyo lokungena: Uhlaselo olugunyazisiweyo olufanisiweyo ukufumana ubuthathaka kwinkqubo
ulawulo lofikelelo: Ukulawula ukuba ngubani okanye yintoni enemvume kwizibonelelo
inkqubo yokufumanisa ukungena: Ubeka iliso kuthungelwano okanye iinkqubo zomsebenzi ongagunyaziswanga
impendulo yesiganeko: Iseti yeenkqubo ezilandelwayo xa kusenzeka isiganeko sokhuseleko
ukujongisisa ubungozi: Ukuchonga kunye nokuvavanya iingozi ezinokubakho kunye nobuthathaka
ukuchacha kwintlekele: Cwangcisa ukubuyisela iinkqubo kunye nokusebenza emva kokuphazamiseka
